usbsimulator.signal.electrical module

class usbsimulator.signal.electrical.USBBus(symb_duration: float = 1 / 12e6, FE: float = 240e6)[source]

Bases: object

Object representing an USB Bus at physical level.

Parameters:

  • sym_duration – the duration of a symbol, default 83ns to comply with FS devices spec

  • FE (float) – the sampling frequency to work with, must be >= 2 * 1/symb_duration, default to 240MHz

Example (connect to the bus, create packet, send it on the USB bus, then disconnect):

 1import random as rd
 2
 3from usbsimulator.protocol.packet import StartOfFramePacket
 4from usbsimulator.protocol.field import FramenumberField
 5
 6# Create the packet to send
 7p = StartOfFramePacket(
 8    FramenumberField(0x0)
 9)
10
11bus = USBBus()
12
13bus.connect()
14bus.send_packet(p)
15bus.disconnect()
16
17# Simulate noise
18noise_function = lambda x: [i + rd.random() for i in x] 
19bus.simulate_noise(noise_function)
20
21# Dump the data
22bus.save_exchange("./dump_directory")
LOW = 0.1

The voltage for a line at LOW state.

HIGH = 3.3

The voltage for a line at HIGH state.

CONNECT_DURATION = 2.5e-07

IDLE duration at connection, default 250ns.

DISCONNECT_DURATION = 4e-06

Disconnect signal duration.

IDLE_FACTOR = 1e-07

The average duration of the IDLE state between each packets if no precise duration is given.

SYNC_PATTERN = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1]

Synchronisation pattern before each packet as described in USB1.1 about full-speed devices.

connect()[source]

Send on the USB bus the signal of connection.

disconnect()[source]

Send on the USB bus the signal of disconnection.

idle(duration: float = None, min_duration: float = None, max_duration: float = None)[source]

Output on the USB bus the IDLE state.

Parameters:

  • duration (float or None) – the duration of the IDLE state (in s)

  • min_duration (float or None) – the min duration of the random IDLE duration (ignored if duration given)

  • max_duration (float or None) – the max duration of the random IDLE duration (ignored if duration given)

send_packet(packet: USBPacket, idle_duration: float = None)[source]

Send a packet on the USB bus

Parameters:

  • packet (USBPacket) – the USB packet to send

  • idle_duration (float or None) – precise time of IDLE state after sending the packet

save_exchange(path: str = './')[source]

Save the signal generated in two separate files

Parameters:

path (str) – the path to save the data

simulate_noise(noise: callable)[source]

Simulate noise on the USB bus

Parameters:

noise (Callable) – the function that will simulate the noise on the bus
